select b.*, f.originalFilename from board AS b inner join ( select f1.file_seq as fSeq, f1.originalFilename as originalFilename, f1.board_seq AS bSeq from file as f1 left join file as f2 on f1.board_seq = f2.board_seq and f1.file_seq > f2.file_seq where f2.file_seq is null AND f1.board_type = 'f' ) as f on b.board_seq = f.bSeq where b.board_type = 'f' order by b.board_seq DESC limit 3;
